homepage.title: Our care team helps you with your business

shopInfos.title: Information about your store
shopInfos.nextBilling: End and renewal of subscription on {nextBilling}

help.title: Need help ?
help.description: A question, a doubt about a feature? Consult the documentation of our

setupGuide.title: Start selling in {remainingSteps} steps | Start selling in {remainingSteps} step | Start selling in {remainingSteps} steps
setupGuide.description: You are impatient. We understand, we are too. But before you start selling, you need to prepare your store. Follow the steps in the list at your own pace to prepare for launch.
setupGuide.description_done: You have completed all the tasks on the list, you can now sell your products online.

modal.title: Permanently close the guide?
modal.description: If you prefer, you can continue without the guide and close it. This action is final.

domain.title: Customize your Domain Name
domain.description: Customize your domain name to boost your store's search engine ranking.

product.title: Add your First Product
product.description: Expand your catalog with your very first product.

payment.title: Configure your Payment Options
payment.description: Enhance your customers' shopping experience by offering multiple payment options on your store.

shipping.title: Configure your Delivery Options
shipping.description: Configure delivery options to send your shippings.

legal.title: Meet your Legal Obligations
legal.description: Ensure your store complies with legal requirements before you begin selling.

logo.title: Customize the look of my store
logo.subtitle: Add a logo
logo.description: Add Logos for your store (Header, E-mails, Invoice, and Favicon)

psxdesign.subtitle: Select and Customize your Theme
psxdesign.description: Choose and customize a theme that defines the look of your store'

minimizedSetupGuide.title: Start selling in {remainingSteps} steps | Start selling in {remainingSteps} step | Start selling in {remainingSteps} steps

congratulations.title: Congratulation !
congratulations.content: You have finished setting up your store!

workshop.title: Take part in our workshops
workshop.subtitle: 1h - Every week
workshop.description: Take advantage of our online workshops every week to discuss several topics on the configuration of the back office

contact-us.title: Need some assistance?
contact-us.description: Don't hesitate to contact our support team.

update-modal.module-needs-update: {moduleName} module needs to be updated to ensure the proper functioning of your store
update-modal.error-occured: An error occurred while updating the module.

care-offers.title: THE HELP YOU NEED, WHEN YOU NEED IT
care-offers.description: Focus on your business. Let us take care of the technical aspects.

bloc-1.title: PrestaShop Diagnostic Ticket
bloc-1.description: Benefit from a complete diagnosis of your site with the help of PrestaShop experts!

bloc-2.title: Quick-start help
bloc-2.description: You've downloaded PrestaShop software and need help to quickly install your online store on your server?

bloc-3.title: Safety pack
bloc-3.description: To address the problem of security vulnerabilities in PrestaShop, we offer a Security Pack comprising an analysis and any associated security actions.

bloc-4.title: SEO Pack
bloc-4.description: Our experts identify and analyze the crawling errors encountered by the Google Bot using the Google Search Console interface. Following the analysis, they provide you with the technical improvements you need to implement for your search engine optimization, and take corrective action.
